keyMoments.title: Battles Pacifista with Crew
keyMoments.description: Luffy leads the Straw Hats in battle against a Pacifista cyborg, coordinating attacks with his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's leadership in coordinating the crew against an overwhelming enemy.

keyMoments.title: Mouton Jet 36 Pound Cannon Combined Attack
keyMoments.description: Luffy coordinates with Zoro and Sanji to perform a powerful combined attack against the Pacifista.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Monster Trio's improved teamwork and coordination in combat.

keyMoments.title: Mouton Jet 36 Pound Cannon Combined Attack
keyMoments.description: Zoro participates in a combined attack with Luffy and Sanji against the Pacifista.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates coordinated teamwork despite Zoro's injuries.

keyMoments.title: Suffers from Previous Wounds
keyMoments.description: Zoro experiences severe pain from wounds sustained during his encounter with Bartholomew Kuma at Thriller Bark, compromising his combat effectiveness.
keyMoments.significance: Highlights the lasting consequences of Zoro's sacrifice at Thriller Bark and makes the crew's situation more desperate.

reveals.information: Still suffering from severe wounds taken from Bartholomew Kuma

keyMoments.title: Mouton Jet 36 Pound Cannon Combined Attack
keyMoments.description: Sanji joins Luffy and Zoro in executing a powerful combined attack against the Pacifista.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Monster Trio fighting together in perfect coordination.

keyMoments.title: Theorizes Pacifista is Not Real Kuma
keyMoments.description: Robin observes the battle and deduces that the 'Kuma' they're fighting is not the real Bartholomew Kuma but some kind of replica.
keyMoments.significance: Robin's intelligence and observation skills provide crucial information about the Pacifista threat.
keyMoments.quote: This isn't the real Kuma. It's something else entirely.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Urouge
keyMoments.description: Kizaru shoots Urouge through the shoulder with a laser beam, instantly taking down the Supernova captain.
keyMoments.significance: First of four Supernova defeats, establishing Kizaru's overwhelming power.

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Yata no Kagami
keyMoments.description: Kizaru uses his Yata no Kagami technique to move at light speed by reflecting himself off surfaces.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases one of Kizaru's signature techniques for light-speed movement.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Scratchmen Apoo
keyMoments.description: Kizaru chases down and defeats Apoo with a devastating light-speed kick.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Kizaru's signature attack and overwhelming speed.
keyMoments.quote: Have you ever been kicked at the speed of light?

keyMoments.title: Defeats X Drake
keyMoments.description: Kizaru swiftly defeats X Drake despite his Ancient Zoan transformation.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even rare Ancient Zoan abilities cannot match Admiral power.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Basil Hawkins
keyMoments.description: Kizaru fires laser shots through Hawkins, defeating him despite his voodoo doll abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Completes Kizaru's sweep of all four Supernova captains.

keyMoments.title: Logia Reformation After Apoo's Attack
keyMoments.description: After being seemingly destroyed by Apoo's sound attack, Kizaru instantly reforms from particles of light.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the near-invulnerability of Logia Devil Fruit users.

abilities.description: Kizaru reflects his light form off surfaces to move at incredible speeds, essentially teleporting by bouncing as light beams.

reveals.information: Can use Yata no Kagami for light-speed movement via reflection

keyMoments.title: Ancient Zoan Transformation Revealed
keyMoments.description: X Drake transforms into an Allosaurus using his Ancient Zoan Devil Fruit, biting the Pacifista and discovering it bleeds red blood.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of an Ancient Zoan transformation in the series. Provides crucial intel about Pacifista construction.
keyMoments.quote: It's bleeding! This thing has red blood!

keyMoments.title: Recognizes Pacifista Laser Technology
keyMoments.description: Drake realizes that the Pacifista's laser beams are identical to Kizaru's light attacks, revealing Vegapunk's technological achievement.
keyMoments.significance: Major revelation about the World Government's ability to replicate Devil Fruit powers in machines.
keyMoments.quote: Those lasers... they're the same as Kizaru's light beams!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Kizaru
keyMoments.description: Despite his Ancient Zoan transformation, X Drake is swiftly defeated by Admiral Kizaru.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the overwhelming power gap between Supernovas and Admirals.

reveals.information: Has eaten the Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Allosaurus, an Ancient Zoan Devil Fruit
Recognizes that Pacifistas use technology derived from Kizaru's Devil Fruit

keyMoments.title: Devil-Conquering Phase Transformation
keyMoments.description: Hawkins activates his Devil-Conquering Phase (Goma no Sō), transforming into a massive scarecrow-like entity with a demon face.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Hawkins' Paramecia-type Straw-Straw Fruit transformation ability and voodoo doll power system.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Kizaru
keyMoments.description: Kizaru shoots laser beams through Hawkins' transformed body, and voodoo dolls fall out as he is defeated.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even Hawkins' unique damage-transfer ability cannot save him from Admiral-level power.

abilities.description: Hawkins transforms into a massive scarecrow-like entity with a demon face, representing a more powerful form of his Straw-Straw Fruit abilities.

reveals.information: Can transform into Devil-Conquering Phase using Wara Wara no Mi

name.japanese: スクラッチメン・アプー

keyMoments.title: Sound-Based Devil Fruit Attack
keyMoments.description: Apoo uses his body as a musical instrument to create devastating sound wave attacks that appear to sever Kizaru's arm and cause him to explode.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Apoo's unique Devil Fruit ability to weaponize sound and music.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Kizaru's Light Speed Kick
keyMoments.description: After his sound attack fails to permanently harm Kizaru, Apoo is chased down and defeated with a light-speed kick.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even creative and powerful Devil Fruit abilities cannot overcome Admiral-level opponents.

reveals.information: Can use his body as instruments to create weaponized sound attacks

keyMoments.title: Muscular Transformation and Defeat
keyMoments.description: Urouge transforms into his muscular 'Hulk mode' and uses Inga Zarashi on a Pacifista, but is immediately shot down by Kizaru.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Urouge's Devil Fruit power while demonstrating Kizaru's superiority over the Supernovas.

abilities.description: A powerful attack technique used by Urouge in his transformed muscular state.

reveals.information: Can transform into a muscular form and use Inga Zarashi technique
